mapper.select: /* SaleRegistMapper.getSaleRegistList */ SELECT POS_NO, BILL_NO, DECODE(SALE_FG,'1','매출','-1','반품') SALE_FG, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SL_SALE_DTL tssd WHERE tssd.STORE_CD = tssh.STORE_CD AND tssd.SALE_DATE = tssh.SALE_DATE AND tssd.POS_NO = tssh.POS_NO AND tssd.BILL_NO = tssh.BILL_NO AND tssd.POS_NO = tssh.POS_NO ) AS BILL_DTL_CNT, TOT_SALE_AMT, TOT_DC_AMT, REAL_SALE_AMT, REAL_SALE_AMT - tssh.VAT_AMT AS GA_AMT, VAT_AMT, ( SELECT SUM(PAY_AMT) FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR_PAY tssp WHERE tssp.STORE_CD = tssh.STORE_CD AND tssp.SALE_DATE = tssh.SALE_DATE AND tssp.POS_NO = tssh.POS_NO AND tssp.BILL_NO = tssh.BILL_NO AND tssp.POS_NO = tssh.POS_NO ) AS PAY_AMT, ( SELECT SUM(PAY_AMT) FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR_PAY tssp WHERE tssp.STORE_CD = tssh.STORE_CD AND tssp.SALE_DATE = tssh.SALE_DATE AND tssp.POS_NO = tssh.POS_NO AND tssp.BILL_NO = tssh.BILL_NO AND tssp.POS_NO = tssh.POS_NO AND tssp.PAY_CD = '01' ) AS CARD_SALE_AMT, ( SELECT SUM(PAY_AMT) FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR_PAY tssp WHERE tssp.STORE_CD = tssh.STORE_CD AND tssp.SALE_DATE = tssh.SALE_DATE AND tssp.POS_NO = tssh.POS_NO AND tssp.BILL_NO = tssh.BILL_NO AND tssp.POS_NO = tssh.POS_NO AND tssp.PAY_CD = '02' ) AS CASH_SALE_AMT, ( SELECT SUM(PAY_AMT) FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR_PAY tssp WHERE tssp.STORE_CD = tssh.STORE_CD AND tssp.SALE_DATE = tssh.SALE_DATE AND tssp.POS_NO = tssh.POS_NO AND tssp.BILL_NO = tssh.BILL_NO AND tssp.POS_NO = tssh.POS_NO AND tssp.PAY_CD NOT IN ('01', '02') ) AS ETC_SALE_AMT, CASE WHEN REG_ID LIKE 'WEB_REG_%' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS MOD_FG FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR tssh WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND SALE_DATE = #{saleDate} ORDER BY POS_NO, BILL_NO

/* SaleRegistMapper.getSelectProdList */ SELECT FN_GET_PROD_CLASS_CD_NM_STR(tmp.STORE_CD, tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD, 'NM_STR') AS PATH_NM, tmp.PROD_CD, tmp.PROD_NM, tmpb.BARCD_CD, tmp.PROD_TYPE_FG, COST_UPRC, SPLY_UPRC, SALE_UPRC, tmp.VAT_FG FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp, TB_MS_PRODUCT_BARCD tmpb, ( SELECT tmpsp.PROD_CD, MIN(SALE_UPRC) KEEP( DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY START_DATE DESC ) AS SALE_UPRC FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE tmpsp WHERE tmpsp.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} GROUP BY tmpsp.PROD_CD ) tmpsp2 WHERE tmp.PROD_CD = tmpsp2.PROD_CD(+) AND tmp.STORE_CD = tmpb.STORE_CD(+) AND tmp.PROD_CD = tmpb.PROD_CD(+) AND tmp.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tmp.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND tmp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%'
AND tmpb.BARCD_CD LIKE '%'||#{barcdCd}||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} CONNECT BY P_PROD_CLASS_CD = PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} )
mapper.insert: /* SaleRegistMapper.getSaleDtl */ INSERT INTO TB_SL_SALE_DTL ( HQ_OFFICE_CD, HQ_BRAND_CD, STORE_CD, SALE_DATE, POS_NO, BILL_NO, BILL_DTL_NO, REG_SEQ, SALE_YN, SALE_FG, DLVR_PACK_FG, CORNR_CD, PROD_CD, PROD_TYPE_FG, VAT_FG, PROD_TIP_YN, SALE_UPRC, SALE_QTY, SALE_AMT, DC_AMT, TIP_AMT, ETC_AMT, REAL_SALE_AMT, VAT_AMT, MEMBR_SAVE_POINT, MEMBR_USE_POINT, REFUND_YN, DOUBLE_AMT, SALE_SCALE_WT, ORDER_EMP_NO, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, CHG_TICKET_NO, PROMTN_PROD_FG, BILL_DT, DLVR_ORDER_FG, DLVR_IN_FG ) VALUES ( #{hqOfficeCd}, '0000000', #{storeCd}, #{saleDate}, '01', #{billNo}, LPAD(#{billDtlNo}, 4, '0'), '01', #{saleYn}, #{saleFg}, '1', '00', #{prodCd}, #{prodTypeFg}, #{vatFg}, 'N', #{saleUprc} * #{saleFg}, #{saleQty} * #{saleFg}, #{saleAmt} * #{saleFg}, #{dcAmt} * #{saleFg}, '0', '0', #{realSaleAmt} * #{saleFg}, #{vatAmt} * #{saleFg}, '0', '0', 'N', '0', '0', '0000', #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId}, '000', '1', #{regDt}, '1', '0' )

/* SaleRegistMapper.getSaleDtlPay */ INSERT INTO TB_SL_SALE_DTL_PAY ( HQ_OFFICE_CD, HQ_BRAND_CD, STORE_CD, SALE_DATE, POS_NO, BILL_NO, BILL_DTL_NO, PAY_CD, REG_SEQ, SALE_YN, SALE_FG, PAY_AMT, DLVR_PACK_FG, CORNR_CD, PROD_CD, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, DLVR_ORDER_FG, DLVR_IN_FG ) SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD, HQ_BRAND_CD, STORE_CD, SALE_DATE, POS_NO, BILL_NO, BILL_DTL_NO, #{payCd}, REG_SEQ, SALE_YN, SALE_FG, CASE WHEN #{payCd} = '01' THEN ROUND(REAL_SALE_AMT * #{cardPer}) * SALE_FG WHEN #{payCd} = '02' THEN ROUND(REAL_SALE_AMT * #{cashPer}) * SALE_FG END, DLVR_PACK_FG, CORNR_CD, PROD_CD, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId}, '1', '0' FROM TB_SL_SALE_DTL WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND SALE_DATE = #{saleDate} AND BILL_NO = #{billNo} AND BILL_DTL_NO = LPAD(#{billDtlNo}, 4, '0')

/* SaleRegistMapper.getSaleDtlDc */ INSERT INTO TB_SL_SALE_DTL_DC ( HQ_OFFICE_CD, HQ_BRAND_CD, STORE_CD, SALE_DATE, POS_NO, BILL_NO, BILL_DTL_NO, DC_CD, REG_SEQ, SALE_YN, SALE_FG, DC_AMT, DLVR_PACK_FG, CORNR_CD, PROD_CD, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, DLVR_ORDER_FG, DLVR_IN_FG ) SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD, HQ_BRAND_CD, STORE_CD, SALE_DATE, POS_NO, BILL_NO, BILL_DTL_NO, '01', REG_SEQ, SALE_YN, SALE_FG, #{dcAmt} * SALE_FG, DLVR_PACK_FG, CORNR_CD, PROD_CD, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId}, '1', '0' FROM TB_SL_SALE_DTL WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND SALE_DATE = #{saleDate} AND BILL_NO = #{billNo} AND BILL_DTL_NO = LPAD(#{billDtlNo}, 4, '0')

/* SaleRegistMapper.getSaleHdr */ INSERT INTO TB_SL_SALE_HDR ( HQ_OFFICE_CD, HQ_BRAND_CD, STORE_CD, SALE_DATE, POS_NO, BILL_NO, REG_SEQ, SALE_YN, SALE_FG, BILL_DT, TOT_SALE_AMT, TOT_DC_AMT, TOT_TIP_AMT, TOT_ETC_AMT, REAL_SALE_AMT, TAX_SALE_AMT, VAT_AMT, NO_TAX_SALE_AMT, NET_SALE_AMT, EXPECT_PAY_AMT, RECV_PAY_AMT, RTN_PAY_AMT, DUTCH_PAY_CNT, TOT_GUEST_CNT, EMP_NO, ORDER_NO, DLVR_YN, MEMBR_YN, RESVE_YN, REFUND_YN, PAY_CHG_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, PICKUP_YN, DLVR_ORDER_FG, TOT_OFFADD_AMT, CUP_AMT ) VALUES ( #{hqOfficeCd}, '0000000', #{storeCd}, #{saleDate}, '01', #{billNo}, '01', #{saleYn}, #{saleFg}, #{regDt}, #{totSaleAmt} * #{saleFg}, #{totDcAmt} * #{saleFg}, '0', '0', #{totRealSaleAmt} * #{saleFg}, #{taxSaleAmt} * #{saleFg}, #{totVatAmt} * #{saleFg}, #{noTaxSaleAmt} * #{saleFg}, (#{totRealSaleAmt} - #{totVatAmt}) * #{saleFg}, #{totRealSaleAmt} * #{saleFg}, #{recvPayAmt} * #{saleFg}, '0', '0', #{saleFg}, '0000', '0000', 'N', 'N', 'N', 'N', 'N', #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId}, 'N', '1', '0', 0 )

/* SaleRegistMapper.getSaleHdrPay */ INSERT INTO TB_SL_SALE_HDR_PAY ( HQ_OFFICE_CD, HQ_BRAND_CD, STORE_CD, SALE_DATE, POS_NO, BILL_NO, PAY_CD, REG_SEQ, SALE_YN, SALE_FG, PAY_AMT, BILL_DT, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, DLVR_ORDER_FG, DLVR_IN_FG ) VALUES ( #{hqOfficeCd}, '0000000', #{storeCd}, #{saleDate}, '01', #{billNo}, #{payCd}, '01', #{saleYn}, #{saleFg}, #{payAmt} * #{saleFg}, #{regDt}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId}, '1', '0' )

/* SaleRegistMapper.getSaleHdrDc */ INSERT INTO TB_SL_SALE_HDR_DC ( HQ_OFFICE_CD, HQ_BRAND_CD, STORE_CD, SALE_DATE, POS_NO, BILL_NO, DC_CD, REG_SEQ, SALE_YN, SALE_FG, DC_AMT, BILL_DT, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, DLVR_ORDER_FG, DLVR_IN_FG ) VALUES ( #{hqOfficeCd}, '0000000', #{storeCd}, #{saleDate}, '01', #{billNo}, '01', '01', #{saleYn}, #{saleFg}, #{totDcAmt} * #{saleFg}, #{regDt}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId}, '1', '0' )

/* SaleRegistMapper.getSalePayCash */ INSERT INTO TB_SL_SALE_PAY_CASH ( HQ_OFFICE_CD, HQ_BRAND_CD, STORE_CD, SALE_DATE, POS_NO, BILL_NO, LINE_NO, LINE_SEQ_NO, REG_SEQ, SALE_YN, SALE_FG, SALE_AMT, TAX_AMT, VAT_AMT, TIP_AMT, NO_TAX_AMT, RECV_AMT, RTN_AMT, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, APPR_PROC_FG, CUP_AMT ) SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD, HQ_BRAND_CD, STORE_CD, SALE_DATE, POS_NO, BILL_NO, '0001', '0001', REG_SEQ, SALE_YN, SALE_FG, #{cashAmt} * #{saleFg}, ROUND(TAX_SALE_AMT * #{cashPer}), ROUND(VAT_AMT * #{cashPer}), '0', ROUND(NO_TAX_SALE_AMT * #{cashPer}), #{cashAmt} * #{saleFg}, '0', #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId}, '3', 0 FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND SALE_DATE = #{saleDate} AND BILL_NO = #{billNo}

/* SaleRegistMapper.getSalePayCard */ INSERT INTO TB_SL_SALE_PAY_CARD ( HQ_OFFICE_CD, HQ_BRAND_CD, STORE_CD, SALE_DATE, POS_NO, BILL_NO, LINE_NO, LINE_SEQ_NO, REG_SEQ, SALE_YN, SALE_FG, SALE_AMT, TAX_AMT, VAT_AMT, TIP_AMT, NO_TAX_AMT, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, VAN_CD, APPR_PROC_FG, CARD_TYPE_FG, CARD_NO, APPR_DT, APPR_NO, APPR_AMT, ACQUIRE_CD, ACQUIRE_NM, APPR_MSG, CUP_AMT ) SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD, HQ_BRAND_CD, STORE_CD, SALE_DATE, POS_NO, BILL_NO, '0001', '0001', REG_SEQ, SALE_YN, SALE_FG, #{cardAmt} * #{saleFg}, ROUND(TAX_SALE_AMT * #{cardPer}), ROUND(VAT_AMT * #{cardPer}), '0', ROUND(NO_TAX_SALE_AMT * #{cardPer}), #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId}, (SELECT VAN_CD FROM TB_MS_STORE WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd}), -- VAN_CD, '2', -- APPR_PROC_FG, '1', -- CARD_TYPE_FG, '*', -- CARD_NO, #{regDt}, -- APPR_DT, '*', -- APPR_NO, #{cardAmt} * #{saleFg}, -- APPR_AMT, '999', -- ACQUIRE_CD, '임의등록', -- ACQUIRE_NM, '임의등록거래', -- APPR_MSG, 0 -- CUP_AMT FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND SALE_DATE = #{saleDate} AND BILL_NO = #{billNo}
mapper.select: /* SaleRegistMapper.getBillDtlList */ SELECT tssd.PROD_CD, tmp.PROD_NM, tssd.SALE_UPRC, tssd.SALE_QTY, tssd.SALE_AMT, tssd.DC_AMT, tssd.REAL_SALE_AMT, tssd.VAT_AMT, tmp.VAT_FG, tmp.PROD_TYPE_FG FROM TB_SL_SALE_DTL tssd, TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp WHERE tssd.STORE_CD = tmp.STORE_CD AND tssd.PROD_CD = tmp.PROD_CD AND tssd.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tssd.SALE_DATE = #{saleDate} AND tssd.POS_NO = #{posNo} AND tssd.BILL_NO = #{billNo}
mapper.insert:
/* SaleRegistMapper.getSalePaySeq */ INSERT INTO TB_SL_SALE_PAY_SEQ ( HQ_OFFICE_CD , HQ_BRAND_CD , STORE_CD , SALE_DATE , POS_NO , BILL_NO , PAY_SEQ , REG_SEQ , SALE_YN , SALE_FG , PAY_CD , PAY_AMT , TAX_AMT , VAT_AMT , TIP_AMT , NO_TAX_AMT , LINE_NO , APPR_PROC_FG , APPR_CARD_NO , APPR_SEQ_NO , CASH_BILL_APPR_PROC_FG , CASH_BILL_CARD_NO , REG_DT , REG_ID , MOD_DT , MOD_ID , CUP_AMT , BILL_DT , DLVR_ORDER_FG , DLVR_IN_FG ) SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD , HQ_BRAND_CD , STORE_CD , SALE_DATE , POS_NO , BILL_NO , #{paySeq} , REG_SEQ , SALE_YN , SALE_FG , #{payCd} , #{payAmt} * #{saleFg} , TAX_AMT , VAT_AMT , TIP_AMT , NO_TAX_AMT , LINE_NO , APPR_PROC_FG
, CARD_NO
, ''
, '0001' , '3' , '0' , #{regDt} , #{regId} , #{modDt} , #{modId} , CUP_AMT , #{regDt} , '1' , '0'
FROM TB_SL_SALE_PAY_CARD
FROM TB_SL_SALE_PAY_CASH
WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND SALE_DATE = #{saleDate} AND POS_NO = '01' AND BILL_NO = #{billNo}
